data.text:
@milophal1 Meanwhile, if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you. (2/2)

@milophal1 ilkeraslan,
we have requested the full refund of both flights. It will be processed as soon as possible.
Regarding a compensation,you should fill in the form available through the following link:https://t.co/sjwAICeOkJ
It will be analyzed and you will be contacted by e-mail.(1/2

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@BenFL Hello FLBen, we  regret hearing that our services did not met your expectations. 
If assistance is needed, we kindly ask you to contact us by private message, with your booking reference. Thank you.

@CJMcHarris Thank you Catherine,
We will reply as soon as possible. Thank you

@Vandesmatt Hello M V. d.,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@jefffernandes1 @TAP_Portugal Olá Jeff, Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas não nos foi possível responder de forma mais célere. Caso ainda necessite de assistência, informamos que nos encontramos ao dispor por esta via. Obrigada

@AAsprogeraka Hello Anna, 
in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@suifcx Olá Su, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@larifromdacoast Hello lari,
please confirm us the booking reference and the passport details via DM. Thank you.

@peachy_hshouse Olá Claudia,
Como indicado anteriormente, logo que tenhamos alguma informação adicional, retomaremos o contacto consigo por esta via. Obrigada

@Nemi71892308 Hello Nemi,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@RemcoLengers Hello Remco,
if you still need our assistance, please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

@yiyoserrano Hello,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@BannonPhilip Hello Philip,
You have one process in treatment and therefore the other two for the same issue have been closed.

@daskgeorgia Hello ᧁꫀꪮ᥅ᧁ꠸ꪖ,
To verify the situation can you please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it?
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.

@Eimzy89 Hello Eimz,

That is not a problem. You may insert a fictitious passport number and expiration date, so the system can allow you to book. As soon as you have the new passport in hands, we kindly ask you to contact us, so we can update the information. Thank you.

@villaran92 Hola Villaran,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. Vamos a contestar a su mensaje privado lo antes posible. Gracias
@natyscaminha Olá Naty, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@oriana_briones Hola Oriana,
Informamos que ya respondemos por Facebook. Gracias

data.text:
@asemhill Hello Annie,
please provide us the lost luggage reference number (PIR) via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@Damien_LM Hello Damien,
We have already replied to your DM.

@golgoli131 Hello,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@CJMcHarris In order for us to be able to check about your question, we kindly request that you provide us with the file reference for the lost luggage. For security reasons and data protection, we advise you to send the details through a private message. Thank you (2/2)

data.text:
@CJMcHarris Hello Catherine,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/2)

@BordBenjamin Bonjour Bord,
nous vérifions la situation. Dès que nous ayons des nouvelles informations, nous retournerons le contact. Merci.

@RubenHibrido Hola Rubén,

Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. Vamos a contestar a su mensaje privado lo antes posible. Gracias

@karelgarcia Hola Karel,

nos podría informar, por mensaje privado, su número de proceso de reclamación y dirección de correo electrónico asociado, para que podamos verificar, por favor? Gracias.

@everflux Hello Everflux,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@Sharon03046627 Hello Sharon,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@MeloCarecchio Bonjour Mélodie, une réponse vous a été apportée en message. Merci.
@cnfapproach @Airbus @AirbusCareers @bhairport_ Good photos deserve to be shared. Thanks, @cnfapproach

data.text:
@onebbb @salsampson @UberFacts Hello Beno, we sincerely apologize for the delay on handling your case, we inform you however that it is not forgotten, you'll be contacted as soon as the analysis is completed. 
The meantime, we kindly ask you to wait and appreciate your understanding. Thank you.

data.text:
@macgodlewski @OurmieresChris Hello Matthias, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private message.
Thank you.
@agent_k_from_b K., as the second claim was made through an entity claim, in order to verify the file number, we kindly request you to contact the entity directly. Thank you.
@_sara_1997_ Hola Sara, lamentamos el retraso, hemos respondido a su mensaje privado. Gracias.
@Al87571223 Hello Al, we apologize for the delay, in order to verify, please send us your report number and associated booking reference by private message. Thank you.

@BlancaPlanet @BezerraKelsei Hola Blanca, lamentamos la demora. Su reclamación sigue en análisis. 
No nos hemos olvidado de usted y de su solicitud. Le rogamos que comprenda y que espere hasta que se complete el proceso. Apreciamos su comprensión.Gracias.
@agent_k_from_b Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you. (II/II)

@agent_k_from_b Hello K., after an analysis of your file, we have verified that it was closed because it is duplicated with another file regarding the same situation. The second file is being analysed and you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. (I/II)

@LarsBrugs Hello Lars,
first of all, please accept our sincere apologies for the waiting.
We will verify the situation and get back to you as soon as possible.
Meanwhile, if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you.

@Andrea74901598 Hello Andrea, we apologize for the situation and all constraints caused. In order to verify the situation, we kindly request you to provide us with the Property Irregularity Report (PIR). For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @Numa1646 Hello Emmanuelle, we inform you that you can request the invoice of your booking via Twitter. In order to do so, please provide us, via private message, with the name, fiscal number and address to be on the documents and an email. Thank you.

data.text: @VitoriaRSilva06 Olá Vitoria, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@balkanskibepi Any question/situation we might be of assistance with through this channel, please let us know.
Thank you. (2/2)

@balkanskibepi Hello Beppe,
we are sorry to hear that your experience did not fully meet your expectations. Apologies for any disappointment caused. 🙁 All of us at TAP know the importance of providing the best service, we are sorry if this was not the case on this occasion. (1/2)

@CuseyDamien @CaboVerde_Gov Hello Damien,
we are truly sorry for the situation and for all the inconvenience caused. You may submit your request for analysis on our page, here - https://t.co/ITUFCNRWuK
Meanwhile, any other situation we might assist you with on this channel, please let us know.
Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @rbauerpjunior Para salvaguardar a confidencialidade dos seus dados, sugerimos o envio através de mensagem privada. Obrigada. (2/2)
@BezerraKelsei Kelsei*

@henrigambi Hello Henri,
first of all, please accept our apologies for the waiting.
We will verify the situation and you will be contacted by e-mail as soon as possible.
Meanwhile, if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you.
@will_rosser However, we have reinforced it. You will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you. (II/II)

@will_rosser Hello Will, after an analysis of your file, we have verified that it is being analysed. At the moment, due to the high number of files, the time taken to finalize the analysis of a situation can be longer than usual. (I/II)
@diogosclopes Hello Diogo, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In case we can be of assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@iiingridcosta For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM. 
Thank you. (2/2)

@endlessverse We sincerely hope that your next flight with TAP can fully meet your expectations and that we can provide you with a more pleasant flight experience.
Any other question/situation we might be of assistance with through this channel, please let us know. Thank you. (3/3)

@endlessverse Sometimes, punctual situations lead to unexpected delays and/or cancellations and we are not able to advice passengers on time or predict it in advance, but TAP is doing all efforts in order to avoid irregularities. (2/3)

@endlessverse Hello Christopher,
we're sorry to hear this was your experience with us. Apologies for any disappointment caused. (1/3)

Em parceria com a @esolidar, serão leiloadas 20 cadeiras triplas de avião (15 de classe económica e 5 de classe executiva) que equipavam os nossos aviões. Esta iniciativa irá angariar fundos para a Associação Portuguesa de Deficientes. Participem: https://t.co/8wPbK1euO9 https://t.co/Z8eo6WC89b

urls.title: TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Licite nos leilões solidários de cadeiras de avião da TAP Air Portugal e ajude a Associação Portuguesa de Deficientes a comprar uma carrinha para transportar os atletas da equipa de basquetebol em cadeira de rodas e respetivas cadeiras de jogo. Não perca esta oportunidade fantástica de adquirir uma peça exclusiva da aviação portuguesa! Faça parte desta onda solidária promovida pela TAP Air Portugal e ajude os atletas da APD a driblarem os obstáculos que os separam da vitória! Boas causas merecem o nosso melhor. Licite e faça a diferença!

data.text: @alexismbouchard Hello Alexis, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@juliaa__pereira @TAP_Portugal Encore une fois, nous vous remercions de votre compréhension et nous restons à votre disposition pour toute autre question. (2/2)

@Sofiapribeiromd Olá Sofia,
Lamentamos a situação reportada bem como o inconveniente causado. Por vezes, por questões operacionais, é necessário fazer uma melhor gestão de certos horários e equipamentos para garantir uma melhor eficiência da nossa parte. (1/2)

@drzeitgeist Caso necessite de alguma ajuda adicional, não hesite em contactar-nos. 
Agradecemos a sua compreensão.

@drzeitgeist Olá Dr. Zeitgeist,
Lamentamos desde já os transtornos causados, aos quais apresentamos o nosso pedido de desculpas.
Sugerimos a consulta do seguinte link: 

✈️https://t.co/0bRAWgbkzO

urls.title: Aviso importante aos clientes
urls.description: A TAP foi recentemente v í tima de um ciberataque, que foi prontamente comunicado a todas as autoridades competentes. A TAP tem estado em estreita coopera ç ã o com as autoridades, em particular com a Pol í cia Judici á ria e o Centro Nacional de Ciberseguran ç a, na investiga ç ã o destes acontecimentos desde 25 de agosto. Embora a TAP tenha implementado imediatamente as medidas e procedimentos adequados de ciberseguran ç a para este tipo de eventos, com o apoio de uma equipa de especialistas internos e

data.text:
@risquete @risquete Hola Jaume, hemos contestado por DM. 
Gracias.

@m_ssaavedra Any other question/situation we might be of assistance with through this channel, please let us know.
Thank you. (2/2)

@MVDSmiles Hello Marie,
We are very sorry for the delay in the answer, fact that is due to the high amount of messages received. 
How can we help you through this channel?
Thank you.

@kriscurtiss @kriscurtiss Hello Kristina, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. If we can still assist you regarding some question, please inform us your booking code. For security reasons we suggest that you do it by direct message. 
Thank you.
@ttdapimenta_ Obrigada, g¡. Vamos verificar e responderemos com a maior brevidade possível.

Ontem, o nosso CS-TON, agora com a pintura TAP Air Cargo, realizou o seu primeiro voo após a conversão para o transporte de carga. O A332 partiu de Lisboa com o seu destino final em Toronto.
O primeiro de muitos! ✈️ https://t.co/dIERV6Rz0j

Yesterday, our CS-TON, now with the TAP Air Cargo livery, had its first flight after being converted to the transportation of cargo only. The A332 departed from Lisbon with Toronto as the final destination.
The first of many! ✈️ https://t.co/8O2nssRGCM

@seeba83 Hello Sebastian,
our apologies for the waiting.
We will verify the situation and you will be contacted by e-mail as soon as possible.
We thank you for your understanding.

@vca_1999 Hello aVe,
We are very sorry about this situation and apologize for any inconvenience.
If our assistance is still needed, please let us know.
Thank you

@LauraDesmond95 Hello Laura,
our apologies for the waiting.
We will verify the situation and get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you.

@milophal1 Hello ilkeraslan,
first of all, please accept our sincere apologies for the situation and for all the inconveniences caused.
In order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number.
Thank you.

@DautanDaniel Hello dautan,
once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.

@jackburgess10 @jackburgess10 Hello Jack, we understand your frustration and sincerely apologize for the situation. As previously informed, the file is being analysed, and has been reinforced. You will receive a reply by e-mail at the earliest. Thank you for your comprehension.
